title: Clark Anderson
author: Clark Anderson
created_time: February 13, 2023, 06:02:50 AMLast edit: May 01, 2023, 12:53:26 PM by Clark Anderson
content: These days many new crypto coins and tokens are being introduced  and It makes a very difficult decision for the investor to choose which coins or tokens should they invest to make some good profit. Many of the new cryptocurrency makes a good pump in their starting days and after on, they dump in a very dramatic way. This cause a very big loss to the investors and the trust in these types to new coins and tokens is finished. So, the main question is that Is it risky to invest in new crypto coins/tokens? or it is good for a very certain time of investment?

comments.author: noorman0
comments.body: Quote from: Clark Anderson on February 13, 2023, 06:02:50 AM-snip-So, the main question is that Is it risky to invest in new crypto coins/tokens? or it is good for a very certain time of investment?There is no certainty of new altcoin from any side. The first time they are listed, they will be more volatile as they deal with the real market interest. Early investors will mostly start selling some (or all) of their holdings, followed by buying at a new investor's exaggerated price expectations.Based on your desire description, you expect the minimum possible risk. Then why would you even bother considering an altcoin instead of bitcoin?

comments.body: Quote from: Clark Anderson on February 13, 2023, 06:02:50 AMSo, the main question is that Is it risky to invest in new crypto coins/tokens? or it is good for a very certain time of investment?At the present time, and in times of uncertainty, fear prevails over the market, and therefore it is difficult to find real or sustainable financial flows for a period, and therefore all new currencies have a cash reserve that you use as liquidity. comments.author: michellee
comments.body: Yes, it is very risky to invest in new crypto coins/tokens. There have been many people who have become victims and many of them have invested using a lot of money even though it is not recommended at all. Maybe they can keep investing in new coins and tokens but only with money they can afford and don't exceed their budget limit.That way, they won't be too sorry if something happens to their coins or tokens. To avoid this, they can choose other coins or tokens that have had a good journey as an investment or if they are confused about a coin or token, they can choose bitcoin as their only investment coin.
